lead_paragraph: MAY--Walter. The Officers and Clergy of Temple Israel of the City of New York mourn the passing of long- time member Walter May. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his bereaved family. Andrew Hoffman, President David J. Gelfand, Rabbi 1/3
